While India won't witness it directly, live streams will be available. Safety is paramount; proper ISO-certified glasses are essential for viewing, and indirect methods are recommended for those without protective gear.

Despite the offer, Maoist violence persisted, raising doubts about the sincerity of the proposal. The government awaits a final decision from top leadership while maintaining counter-Naxal operations.

description: Employers will now need to pay $100,000 (around ₹83 lakh) annually for each H-1B employee, making renewals a costly decision. The move, officials say, is aimed at ensuring only highly skilled workers are hired while boosting U.S. revenue. For Indian professionals, who make up the majority of H-1B holders, the change raises uncertainty around jobs and green card hopes. Oral microbes tied to higher pancreatic cancer risk: key factors and prevention tips
description: A recent NYU Langone Health study reveals a significant connection between oral microbes and pancreatic cancer risk. Specific bacteria and fungi in the mouth can more than triple the likelihood of developing this aggressive cancer. Maintaining good oral hygiene is highlighted as a potential preventive measure, alongside other lifestyle changes like avoiding smoking and maintaining a healthy diet.

title: H-1B visa hike: JPMorgan asks staff to return to US before Sept 21
description: JPMorgan has advised H1-B visa holders abroad to return to the US before September 21. This follows President Trump's order of a $100,000 annual fee for each H-1B worker. Microsoft has issued a similar advisory. The new rule is expected to impact Indian IT firms like Infosys and TCS.

title: H-1B visa fees hike to $100K: Microsoft warns employees; asks to return immediately
description: Microsoft urged its H-1B and H-4 visa employees to return to the US before the September 21 deadline due to a new $100,000 annual fee per H-1B worker. The company also advised those already in the US to remain there.

title: NFL: Gracie Hunt shares heartfelt update with boyfriend amid Chiefs skid
description: Gracie Hunt, the Kansas City Chiefs' heiress, shared heartwarming photos on Instagram from a wedding she attended with her boyfriend, Derek Green. The couple, who have known each other since childhood through their families' connection to the Chiefs, looked deeply in love. Hunt expressed her views on love and faith in the post's caption, emphasizing its importance in daily life.

title: Charlie Kirk’s assassination: Erika Kirk pulls Taylor Swift into controversy
description: Following Charlie Kirk's shocking assassination, his widow, Erika Kirk, has ignited controversy by involving Taylor Swift in memorial plans. Erika's ambition to outshine a Taylor Swift concert at Kirk's memorial event on September 21st has sparked outrage among Swift's fans.

title: Lauren Kyle: NHL star Connor McDavid’s wife opens her cottage retreat
description: Lauren Kyle McDavid, wife of Edmonton Oilers captain Connor McDavid, is featured in ELLE Canada, showcasing her lakeside cottage. The interior designer, entrepreneur, and founder of Kyle & Co Design highlights a space that blends European elegance with modern simplicity, as her retreat reflects her love for entertaining. Along with thoughtful design details, she creates a warm, welcoming atmosphere.

title: Hidden truth revealed: Travis Hunter’s confesses to Deion Sanders' impact
description: Travis Hunter Jr., the top high school player in 2021, surprised everyone by choosing Jackson State against his father's wishes for Florida State or Georgia. Driven by his admiration for Deion Sanders, Hunter Jr. excelled at Jackson State before following Sanders to Colorado. He became a two-way star, mirroring Coach Prime's legacy, showcasing his talent on both offense and defense.
